text: The Custom Mary is a 2011 American drama film written and directed by Matt Dunnerstick. == Notables == The film features one of the last performances of the late Bill McKinney. Music by the Mexican indie band, Porter, appears throughout the film. == Cast == * Alicia Sixtos — Mary * James Jolly — Joe * Travis Hammer — Paul Jr. * Henry LeBlanc — Paul Sr. * Spencer Scott — Jesus (voice) == Review == On TheEspresso.com: "The Custom Mary is a welcome expanding of vision and a modern parable worthy of your time." == References == Category:2011 drama movies Category:2010s American drama movies
title: The Custom Mary
